title: Jungle
body:
Why jungle is so nerfed and game feels so ugly that It made me to uninstall league twice?! It was a great game until season 7 tho...
    Jungler (powerfarm+stole 2 camps, red and raptors of enemy jungler) 3/0/1: 6lvl
    Support: 0/0/0 6lvl
    ADC: 0/0/0 7lvl
    Mid: 0/1/0 7 Lvl
    Top: 1/1/0 7 Lvl
   Whole season 8 and before junglers had 25% or more XP. that means all those seasons were wrong, let's make junglers a support role, solo carry is over for junglers even if ur playing in lower elo. They wanted to reduce lvl2 jungler powers, they failed again. They wanted to nerf jg overall performance, They succeed cuz Jungle is dead. Only viable champs are early game and heavy ganker junglers, no more powerfarm, no more fights with junglers for their buffs/camps. They even nerfed scuttle. Hey Riot? I'm done with this game. I know I won't be missed but until they make something great Imn't coming back.
    P.S. Oh and for 3 months of preseason we've got turret plating. No new items, runes, jungle changes, item reworks, etc.
    P.P.S Don't forget the overall dmg is still damn high and nothing changed yet.

replies.body: 100% agreed

>They wanted to reduce lvl2 jungler powers, they failed again. They wanted to nerf jg overall performance, They succeed cuz Jungle is dead. 

Victim complex so much right ?

I wont feel bad for the role that has been the most impactful in the game for years, it was about time that jungle got the nerfs the role deserved.

Tbh jungle by design must be most impactful role, i don't think it's possible to make a role which can roam entire map less impactful than any bound-to-lane role. Jungle is basically a role which gets to impact lanes for exchange for lower solo XP and gold income.

ofc also jungle is the most impactful role only in early to mid game, after 15-20 minutes (unless fed) jungle loses its impact, and then mid/bot are the most impactful role(s).

I'd say that jungle deserved nerfs, that's for sure, but lowering the XP rates from midgame changed almost nothing when it comes to early impact

Well and how would you impact their early game ganks ?

Beacause when you say this it seems that you dont know neither how to do it.

>Tbh jungle by design must be most impactful role, i don't think it's possible to make a role which can roam entire map less impactful than any bound-to-lane role. 

And if that's true I can understand why they went for xp nerfs and I apreciate that if they cant nerf early preassure of Jungle they nerf other aspect of jungle, as they nerfed how they scale to midgame.

If lvl 2 ganks are a big problem, i'd make all camps spawn 5-10 seconds later, if it doesn't work i'd give first red/blue more hp, but reduce it's lvl 1 dmg, so the hp of junglers after clearing it would stay the same. lvl 2 ganks are a cool concept for me, but right now they are possible ~10-15 secs too early. 

As far as i can tell as a jungler currently only lvl 2 ganks are oppressive, laners hit lvl 3 before junglers unless said junglers get a lvl 2 kill. 

I just hope that jungle won't go back to being the second support again, i had enough of Sejuani/Zac duty in s7. I mean, i like both Seju and Zac, but having no hope of doing anything off your own sucks.

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BHvAdR7H,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-01-28T09:10:57.411+0000)

Maybe tuning the 3 junglers that are being problematic?? its basically a camille, lee and xin problem

> [{quoted}](name=skulldeadboss,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BHvAdR7H,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2019-01-28T11:24:12.246+0000)
>
> Maybe tuning the 3 junglers that are being problematic?? its basically a camille, lee and xin problem

Maybe what they do (If they were smart and could actually admit they made mistakes)
is to remove scuttle changes/remove xp nerfs and nerfs before that and those of 8.11 (3 times for xp nerf btw and hasn't be a year) and then let first wave of lane minions give extra xp so jungler isn't level or 2 above solo laners.

Scuttle changes is the main reason there is a  Super ,duper major, colossal , big lack of diversity in jungle. There used to be a time where you would choose to draft an early jungler or late scaling jungler or you know actually try to fill what your team actually needed (Scuttle is major contributor of the demise).

Runes are another factor, dmg overall in game is way too high thus games are way way shorter than a late game scaling champ needs (yet they just decided to up the speed instead of scaling damage/early/mid game back)

Being impactful by design is one thing but it shouldnt also be low risk which is the entire problem riot refuses to adress.

Either you heavily nerf their sustain so they will be OOM and/or half health when clearing the jungle so you actually are able to 1v2 as a laner and the junglers has to decide if it's a good decision to gank or if it might go horribly wrong OR BUFF THE FUCKIN CAMPS so a jungler that sits on a lane non stop ACTUALLY gets punished for doing it and not getting anything out but for that to happen catch up XP needs to go and riot is hellbent on keeping it.
u know botlane exists right? a good adc with a good support can literally 2v5. i have done it its not easy but its way easier then doing a 3v5 with mid top and jungle.

Wait are you saying that I cant complain because the agency of 2 players (adc + supp) is higher than the agency of 1 player (jungler) ?

No no, it doesn't works like that and I will compare the impact on the game that Jungler has with the impact that a Toplaner, a Midlaner, an ADC or a Supp has on it's own.

And if you think that Botlane can 2vs5 you are stuck in past metas, solo lanes and Jungle are the dominant roles.

tbh every lane can go 1 or 2  vs 5 if they're good enough, and if they'll manage to get fed. Literally yesterday i got carried hard by Ashe.

Botlane isn't just the "guaranteed" win condition anymore, and i like that.

Oh an Ashe carried you on a normal game, everything has changed.

We are on trash elo, everyone can carry but just because a Fiora carried a game on Gold on the Ardent meta it didn't meant that she couldn't complain about enchanters and adcs ruling the meta right ? "Lol you just carried a game you cant complain"

He/she's saying that in general it's easier to carry through botlane 2vs8 than through Jng and solo lanes 3vs7 if I'm not understanding anything wrong, which I think it's a blatant lie on this meta.

Well i can't deny that carrying with top+mid+jungle is much stronger right now. But at once, three people are more than two right? 

I'd say when it comes to single lane then botlane still have the best potential when it comes to carrying. When it's more than single lane, then sure, bot isn't as good.

>Well i can't deny that carrying with top+mid+jungle is much stronger right now. But at once, three people are more than two right?

I'm not saying that 3 persons shouldn't carry more than 2 and I never said that, I'm just saying that it's non sense to say otherwise as he claimed, he's the one that says that 2 persons carry easier than 3.

>I'd say when it comes to single lane then botlane still have the best potential when it comes to carrying. 

Because...there's the *double* the players on Botlane than on a solo lane? Counting it by lanes and not by players it's flawled in a game like Lol, so if I think that counting by lanes it's irrelevant let me correct this last sentence,

>~~When it's more than single lane~~, then sure, bot isn't as good.
All what i have to say is that bot is still the second best duo combination when it comes to carrying, and only jungle+mid beat it.
Based on what you think that it's better Duo Bot than Duo Top/Jng to carry ?

Based on smaller map impact of top/jungle, plus less reliable carry potential of top. If one jungler ends up sitting top, then it's going to end with second jungler staying bot and getting free drakes. And then bot+jungler wins in 90% cases vs top and jungle.

>And then bot+jungler wins in 90% cases vs top and jungle.

Yeah I agree but, well, that would be a 3 man premade and we are talking about a 2 man premade right?  And the Jng doesn't have to sit top if he's on a premade with a Toplaner, with just a early gank you already decise his lane, or you can sit Top and maybe the enemy jungler is r* and wont do anything.

And dont think that just for playing a duo Botlane it means that your Jungler will be great or will come bot to contest drakes, you cant control what the jungler does and that's why I think that any Duo with Jungler +  any role is better than any combination of 2 roles that are not jungle.

Probably the worst combinations are Toplane + Adc and Toplane + Supp imo because they have no way to help each others.
I like how at the moment we were just talking without downvoting each other and hours later we are both downvoted on this comment chain xd

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BHvAdR7H,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-28T06:40:22.712+0000)

Adc and suport have something to tell you mate

The Gameplay Boards is upvoting a thread that unironically claims that **Jungle is dead**

That tells me enough, I'll be here on this kind of threads to be downvoted for reminding that Jungle deserved the nerfs and I'll do it pleased.
It literally nerfed most junglers and just buffed karthus jungle even more

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BHvAdR7H,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2019-01-28T11:32:07.320+0000)

> That tells me enough, I'll be here on this kind of threads to be downvoted for reminding that Jungle deserved the nerfs and I'll do it pleased.

Again, Riot said they nerfed it cause they want to reduce early junglers presure, but what they did is making early junglers even more impactfull than the others, so no problem is solved at all, the nerf had afected in the oposite way it was intended and so no problem has been solved, nontheles more have been created.

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BHvAdR7H,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-28T06:40:22.712+0000)
>
> Victim complex so much right ?
> 
> I wont feel bad for the role that has been the most impactful in the game for years, it was about time that jungle got the nerfs the role deserved.

But the moment always dominate and always needed marksmen gets nerfed hell breaks loose and every adc main is crying. I don’t play jungle but riot doesn’t know balance my lane/class and the players want the riot to take away the only useful rune for my the majority of my champions. Let me know if you which know which role is that?

to have great impact it seems power farming is now a must because in late game if the enemy jungle stole all of your camps then they are ahead and can carry, i have been doing better in games now where I power farm as much as I can while trying to get all drags and rift solo 

I might be a little off here but thats what has been working for me at least

It's still working for me as well but I'm absolutely fucked if I get counter jungled. Some champs (lee, kha, cam) fuck me up when they invade. And I get it, I fucked up if i let the enemy counter jg. I should be punished for it but sometimes it literally feels impossible to come back if you fall behind as jg with the exp nerfs.

AFK farming is stupid in the first place dude. No matter how much it annoys me,  it is a team game, and riot is doing everything in their power to push that as hard as possible. And that includes making roles and playstyles that do nothing for their team less viable. Ganking for your lanes is really important dude.

Farming junglers should not be AFK farming, nor should they be doing that all game. If you see it, they are doing it wrong. 

Most farming junglers will have lower KP than others, but they make up for it by objective control, counter ganking, or stealing when the enemy ganks unsuccessfully. Also a farming jungler will be a bit richer and allow them to buy pinks, which protects laners. Of course as you said this is a bit less interactive, but there are windows where ganking, even as a farming jungler cannot be ignored. 

Professional players have MUCH less ganks than a solo q game due to respect of ganks. So Farming is actually the pros go to strategy, for both lanes and jungle. However, there are reason they don't pick farming junglers, like threat to gank, dueling abilities etc. 

So AFK farming is not "stupid" it's actually more strategic (when done correctly) than ganking as your are not just looking for a mistake/ overextended lane. Rather pathing efficiently and pressuring different areas of the map at times and controlling it, planning ahead until an exploit can be found which includes a gank. 

Focusing on ganking in League should actually be a BAD strategy, (It's not) due to players should be respecting losing match ups and potential ganks. Level 2 ganks should NEVER work, but they do because players value that 24 gold over the potential gank. 

Ganking is important, the only difference with a farming jungler than a ganking jungler is that early game ~10 min the do not do as much ganking, but after this point they should be grouping and destroying towers taking dragons and rift. Vision control and tracking, should double up and the pace of the game should pick up.  

Now I'm not going to pretend that farming junglers are perfect and this happens every time. I have SEEN farming junglers seemingly AFK for 20 mins and be like well I almost hit my spike. On the flip side , I've seen ganking junglers into farming junglers that just inted and the farmer had to do nothing, but scale up for 10 minutes then stomp the game. 

Now that you've heard a slighty neutral/ fammers perspective. This is the important part. 

We clearly have different ways we want to play league, that should be embraced with clear strengths and weaknesses. You like ganking cool. I like Farming great. There should be a strategy for both of those. ATM farming is crippled, in favor of ganking. I, and I believe the OP does as well, want the balance of the 2 strategies closer together.

If they want jg to be more of a support role then they should at least give catch up exp for jglers who are behind...that way jg will still stay at bot lane's lvl but jglers who got fked early game would still be able to catch up.

I am going a bit off topic - But does anybody here feel that Shyvanna is overpowered as a jungler after her buffs?

I played jungle today and she took the dragon at level 3 before I could run from base to dragon's pit. I was playing Warwick so I know what an early drake looks like but in her current state playing her pretty much means a guaranteed drake. I don't see how powerfarm junglers such as Yi or Jax can ever survive in this meta when early game junglers such as her pretty much guarantee her team objectives.

AHAHAHAH Shyvana OP. Ahhh.... nice one. (Joking)

No Shyvana had 10% damage before the increase of 13% can only (granted she is doing max damage) increase the objective time by 1.3 seconds per 10 so if it takes her 20 seconds to get a dragon before, now it's 17.4 not a huge time saver this also does not address a plethora of other issues with Shyvana. She could do everything she did before easily. Shyvana did get a buff, but think about the huge nerf to farming. The net gain was clearly a loss. So She's definitely low tier unless you know how to play her in certain match ups.

I am not here to sit and talk about it with you. I was surprised at how fast she takes jungle objectives these days and posted about it here.

If you wanna write a paragraph, I suggest you start a blog.

She isn't an early jungler.
She lack of ganking skill(her w is bad), she doesn't provide Cc until 6 which is very small and require to stay behind the target.
She is a powerfarm jungler just like yi and jax.
I'm ok with her soloing drake irl.
This is her strenght but u can still play around it (since you know that shyvana spend more time around bot side for early dragon) ,kill her or constest drake while she's doing it since even tho she deal more dmg to dragon, smite still deal the same dmg as you and also since she lack of a dash until 6, it's a free kill.
About ww, he can soloing drake just like shiv (at low lv) but he has a functional gank tool and a sustain kit while she has only dmg.
I haven't played much of Shyvanna but I was really surprised to see just how fast she gets objectives after her last buff. I will have to play her to discover her full kit now.
I used to love sated {{champion:56}} {{champion:266}}

tbh, junglers had as much xp as botlane in the past. It is only normal that they get their XP reduced. 

and idk where you're getting this sample from, cause in every game I play, the adc has the same lvl as the support, and junglers still are higher in XP than botlane.
Bot laners get shit exp anyway. Why would you want to nerf it any further?

I dont know why you guys complain about the jungle. From my perspective of midlaner I only saw this all the season :

Jungler gank level 2, gank level 4 , gank level 6 , gank , gank , gank , gank.

It is just so frustrating to play vs 2 people in midlane. Of 50 ganks you will die once 100% because they can flash both, they have cc , ignite , smite. 

And doing that ganks he never was punished, he get kills , a lot of farm. So where is the point? To win if only your ´´jungler´´ counter gank? Thats not gonna happen we are not in challenger.

I understand someone can camp you 2 times or 5 even more but to camp you 20 times and dont get punished?

You have to decide what you gonna do in the match, no ´´Lets camp this guy because I dont lose nothing´´

You have no idea how disgusting is is to stay in midlane playing against that. It is the worst feeling and the most tilting posible in this game.

And when it is a tank and gets level 6+ good luck being dived under tower with 30 CC + ignite + smite + skills (and both flash to escape)

Junglers had too much impact in this game. And in past seasons they didnt. So why people pretend like junglers NEED to have a lot of impact when it never wasn´t like that? This was a mistake that Riot didn´t realize with time.
Yup. Agree 100%.
Do like me, i started playing top, it's less frustrating trust me!
